description:
LATEST: Course is up to date for February 2016.

Learn how to create an eCommerce store using the Big Commerce platform.

Learning objectives

at the end of the course, students will be able to...

  • Design an eCommerce Store as good looking as mine.
  • Start selling beyond eBay.
  • Create an eCommerce Store on the Big Commerce Platform.

Why should you listen to me

I've been selling online since 2006 and have sold over $750,000 in total. I started an online retail business and made my first sale 2 weeks later. Sales to date have been over $525,000.00 (this is confirmed in lecture 1 and 2).

What effectively works for one person will effectively work the same for any other person.

Only a very limited number of people know this information. That means you'll have limited competition in this area to maximize your probability for success.

Scroll up and Enroll Now!
title: Build a Bigcommerce Store: Tutorial for BigCommerce
